channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- Ktor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- Ktor

item.title: CVE-2023-34339|2023-06-01T18:12:29.648Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.3.1 headers containing authentication data could be added to the exception's message

item.title: CVE-2023-45612|2023-10-09T10:20:53.533Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.3.5 default configuration of ContentNegotiation with XML format was vulnerable to XXE

item.title: CVE-2023-45613|2023-10-09T10:20:54.104Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 2.3.5 server certificates were not verified
